Innovative Web Service

We

Photography is the best way to connect to people and capture their smiles forever. It is an art of using different angles and lights to capture the moments and make them memories. Our team at Innovative Web Service has the capability to take perfect pictures for the clients at their special occasions.
  • Always careful with the flash.
  • Capture special moments so you can see them later.
  • Use the best angles and lightning.
  • Always careful with the aperture.

Our Services

We offer the best services for your need

Wedding Photography

Wedding photography means to capture the most important event of your life with your loved one. It includes capturing the photographs of the decor, family, and the bride and groom.

Event Photography

Event photography means to cover the entire event with photographs. It is the practice of photographing guests and occurrences at any event or occasion. We provide the best lightning and perfect angles.

Portrait Photography

Portrait photography means to capture the personality of the subject with the great light, effective backdrops, perfect angles, etc. A portrait picture might be artistic, or it might be clinical, as part of a medical study.

Product Photography

Product photography allows you to showcase your products and let the potential customers see it from all the angles. It has a goal of presenting a product in the best possible photographic representation.

Fine art Photography

Fine-art photography is photography created in line with the vision of the photographer as artist, using photography as a medium for creative expression. The goal of fine-art photography is to express an idea, a message, or an emotion.

Pre wedding or couple Photography

Couple photography is the most beautiful because that allows us to capture the love moments of a couple before marriage or a newly wed couple. These kinds of memories stay longer.

Fashion Photography

Fashion photography is known to capture clothes and other fashion items that can attract customers and increase sales. Fashion photography is most often conducted for advertisements or fashion magazines or to showcase your products catalogue.

Architectural Photography

Architectural photography is also called as buildings’ photography or structure photography. It can include shooting building exteriors and interiors, as well as bridges, other structures, and cityscapes.

Travel Photography

This world has beautiful places and views that need to be captured in photographs. Travel photography is a genre of photography that may involve the documentation of an area's landscape, people, cultures, customs and history.

Advertising or lifestyle Photography

Photography is important in marketing because it tells a story. Advertising or lifestyle photography aims to capture portraits of people in situations, real-life events or milestones in an artistic manner and the art of the everyday.

Pet Photography

It’s time to give your pet a good photoshoot. Pets are most likely to make you feel the best and thus, they deserve to be treated properly and a good photoshoot with a nice lightning is all it takes.

Sports Photography

Sports photography is to capture all types of sports and their major goals and falls. It is usually for the editorial or newspaper purposes.Sports photography is a branch of photojournalism.

Aerial Photography

Aerial photography is to take pictures and shoot videos from the air in an aircraft. Platforms for aerial photography include fixed-wing aircraft, helicopters, unmanned aerial vehicles, balloons, blimps and dirigibles, rockets, pigeons, kites, parachutes, stand-alone telescoping and vehicle-mounted poles.

Our Expertise

You deserve better than a one-size-fits-all option. Our agency's capabilities are focused around one thing –
creating leading industry-leading websites. Below is a list of our best web designing services.

Pre / post wedding

Wedding photography is a specialty in photography that is primarily focused on the photography of events and activities relating to weddings. It may include other types of portrait photography of the couple before the official wedding day, such as a pre-wedding engagement session (photographs are later used for the couple wedding invitations).

I Want A Free Quote >>

Fashion photography

Fashion photography is a genre of photography which is devoted to displaying clothing and other fashion items. Fashion photography is most often conducted for advertisements or fashion magazines such as Vogue, Vanity Fair, or Elle. Fashion photography has developed its own aesthetic in which the clothes and fashions are enhanced by the presence of exotic locations or accessories.

I Want A Free Quote >>

Architectural photography

Architectural photography is the photographing of buildings and similar structures that are both aesthetically pleasing and accurate representations of their subjects. Architectural photographers are usually skilled in the use of specialized techniques and cameras.

I Want A Free Quote >>

Portrait photography

Portrait photography or portraiture in photography is a photograph of a person or group of people that captures the personality of the subject by using effective lighting, backdrops, and poses. A portrait picture might be artistic, or it might be clinical, as part of a medical study.

Get Pricing & Packages

Our Development Process

01

CONSULTATION

Our team focuses on writing down each and every requirement and idea about the client’s project and understanding it in depth because communication is the key.

02

RESEARCHING

We research about the given idea and put down all the points together to get a better idea about the targets that we have to achieve and show the results for.

03

CREATION

Our team works together to make the outline and the base designs that can be changed anytime. This strategy has worked for all the projects we did in the past.

04

DESIGNING

The outline is then designed as an initial product that can be shown to the client and to get an idea about how the final product will come out to be.

05

CLIENT’S INPUT

We involve the client in the process of designing because his ideas and opinions matter to us the most and any immediate changes can be made.

06

DELIVERY

We then pass the final design through multiple testing sites to make sure that the design is ready to handover to the client without any flaw in it.
